title: As Europe's border crisis eases, migrants face return to reality they sought to escape
content:
1. As Europe's border crisis eases, migrants face return to reality they sought to escape  NBC News
  2. Iraqi refugees paid smugglers to help get them into Europe  Al Jazeera English
  3. Yazidi family abandons EU dream, reluctantly returns to Iraq  Associated Press
  4. Poland border crisis: Camp empty as migrants move to warehouse  BBC News
  5. Hundreds of Iraqis repatriated from Belarus amid border crisis  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 欧州の国境危機が緩和されると、移民たちは逃れようとした現実に直面する。
随着欧洲边境危机的缓解，移民面临着回到他们试图逃避的现实中去
隨着歐洲邊境危機的緩解，移民面臨着回到他們試圖逃避的現實中去
